content: **this is for dolls ** this pattern is sized to fit the body of knit doll keito keito s body size height 37cm to tip of the toe bust 18cm waist 13cm hips 18cm foot 3 5cm the process of making this pants begins from the waist and in the middle of the process the stitches are divided into the left leg and knitted toward the hem the design features of this pants are a fake belt loop on the waistband and a fake pocket on the butt about me… my english isn t perfect so you may not understand the text when you knit my pattern at that time please refer to the photo guide in my blog i hope you enjoy my pattern
